title: Lost Temple - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Love Interests   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Power Couple   Virtual Reality
author: Yue Yao   月曜
description: Lost Temple, is a large-scale brainwave online game, our protagonist also entered the game warehouse and began a fantasy trip. The silent encounter of the angel family assassin turned out to be the world’s top bounty hunter in reality. All the way through, he was willing to wash his hands to make soup, he did not hesitate to wing his wings, when friendship has become love? Can love in the virtual world be corrected in reality?>
